text: Yo pana bhikkhu sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 26. Should any bhikkhu, having requested thread, have robe-cloth woven by weavers, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
๒๖. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใดขอด้ายมาเองแล้ว ยังช่างหูกให้ทอจีวร เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
26. Should any bhikkhu after asking by himself for thread get weavers to weave it into robe (material), this entails expiation with forfeiture.
